alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:20PM CDT until May 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... East central Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 520 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles west of Heavener to 8 miles west of Morgan Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Midland... Cameron... Patterson... Heavener Runestone Park... Arkola... Hodgen... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
